amendment.description: To require a report on the development and utilization by the Department of Defense of robotics and unmanned ground vehicle systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2536 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12783) To require a report on the development and utilization by the Department of Defense of robotics and unmanned ground vehicle systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2536 proposed by Senator Warner.
